hero_slide2_subtitle: Full management of visas and permits
section_description: Axenta Global Energy & Service S.L. is a company based in Andalusia, Spain, primarily specialized in workforce placement from both European Union countries and non-EU countries. Our commitment is to provide legal, transparent, and effective solutions to connect people with the companies that need talent.
card1_text: We select workers from the European Union and outside to meet the demand in Spain.
card2_text: All processes are managed legally, clearly, and transparently.
card3_text: We comply with labor legislation and ensure the rights of workers and companies.
card4_text: We collaborate with trusted companies and partners in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
valor2_text: Respect for both clients and workers.
valor4_text: We care about people, not just numbers.
servicio1_text: Looking for a fresh start in agriculture or construction? Join a team that values your skills and supports your journey.
servicio2_text: Ready to shape the future of commercial, industrial, office, and residential spaces? Join our team.
servicio3_text: Join a team that delivers efficient and safe transport with precision and pride. We‚Äôre committed to premium quality, reliable service.
servicio4_text: Join a team that delivers professional services to restaurants, hotels, and catering with precision and care. If you take pride in the details.
beneficio2: Experience in the international labor sector
beneficio3: Apoyo continuo a trabajadores y empresas

gallery.title: Who we are
gallery.text: We are a company specialized in bringing workers to Spain from both the EU and non-EU countries, providing full assistance with visas, work permits, and support throughout the entire process.

gallery.title: Collaboration Steps
gallery.text:
1. Brief and requirements
2. Contract and schedule
3. Recruitment and documentation
4. Arrival and integration into the position

gallery.title: FAQ
gallery.text:
Q: How long does it take to receive personnel?
A: Depending on the profile and documentation, 3‚Äì8 weeks for non-EU; 1‚Äì3 weeks for EU.

Q: Do you also manage accommodation?
A: We can coordinate options and logistics according to the project.

Q: What guarantees do you offer?
A: Contractual transparency clauses, replacement during trial period according to agreement.
